name: A.S.A.P. Advisor Services
overview:
A.S.A.P. Advisor Services, Inc. | Investment Marketing Services & Database Management Solutions

We provide investment marketing services and database management solutions for institutional money managers, hedge fund managers and other financial advisors. Our flagship services, ManagerQuest® and HedgeQuest®, streamline the time-consuming and costly process of providing firm and product information to institutional investment management consultants and third-party databases. The timely and accurate provision of such information is essential in order to secure new assets and service existing clients.

The A.S.A.P. team manages a global client base of greater than 100 investment managers, representing 650 unique strategies and more than $2.3 trillion is assets under management. Our family of clients range from small, emerging managers to large, global firms, but they all have one thing in common – they trust us to manage information integral to their business success.

acquisition.source_description: eVestment Acquired A.S.A.P. Advisor Services in December, 2011
